headline.main: CATHOLIC STUDENTS SCORE BIRTH CURBS; Greater Study of Pope's Plan to End War Is Recommended

lead_paragraph: Birth control was condemned yesterday by delegates to the monthly meeting of the New York regional division of the National Federation of Catholic College Students. Ten metropolitan Catholic colleges were represented at the conference held at St. John's University, Brooklyn.
abstract: Certain ones commended by Natl Cath Coll Students Fed for E Flynn trial handling
